"A.P.???/?/??/10:00":
"Oh, you've noticed. I was a
little worried since no one
asked me about it."

"I thought that if I were to show
that I was properly growing, I could
understand everyone's state of mind.
So I decided to grow according to
my age."

"By the way, when he created us
two years ago, he was already in
this form. I have no idea how Xiao
looked in his child form."

"Hmmm... Xiao's child form.
Sounds like he had a very
cheeky appearance, no?"

"If I had looked cheeky, then it
was probably due to the link I had. "

"Xiao was linked to Sara.
So let's see..."
"Hey, try to sugarcoat it a little!"

"That was a very direct comment,
but I won't deny it."

"My personality was created based on
Sara's. Even now, I'm still
influenced by Sara's personality."

"Aside from that, if I'm awfully frank,
it's also because of Sara."

"But if he's influenced by the
link, does that mean Xiao's taken
a liking to it?"

"No comment.
You're free to think whatever
you wish."

"Well, the best thing about growing
up is being able to pat Sara's head."

"Sara doesn't like it too much,
but I think it's fun."
